content: this legal case identified as case no sodba višjega sodišča v kopru cp 3342021 involves two parties whose names are not mentioned the case was heard by the higher court in koper the text explains the progress of the case which includes a cost procedure and a compensation decision in the first instance court the case has now reached the court of appeal the judgment made in the first instance relates to the undepreciated value of an olive grove with 50 ownership for each party who are exspouses the court of appeal has dismissed an appeal in the case the legal procedure is based on the marriage family relations act and the civil procedure act the court has made a decision in favor of one party dismissing the primary claim and upholding the alternative claim the court has also ordered one party to pay the costs of the appeal proceedings the court of appeal has reviewed the case and found evidence to support the decision made by the court of first instance the court has determined the value of the property and considered the investments made during the cohabitation period the court of appeal has rejected claims made by the third defendant and has upheld the original judgment the court has also made a decision regarding the costs of the proceedings taking into account the value of investments and the success of the parties the court of appeal has dismissed three appeals and upheld the original judgment ordering the appellants to pay the costs there are disputes regarding the creation of something new and allegations related to plumbing but the court found the evidence provided to be insufficient the court has considered the increase in the value of the property due to investments made during the cohabitation period the applicant refers to a different view taken by another court but it is not considered settled caselaw
